Ciccronis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Operibus</TITLE>, cum Delectu Commentariorum �a7 <AUTHOR>Josepho dOlivet</AUTHOR>, in sch�f6n Pappier mit neuer Schrifft, von St. Augustini Text und Garamondi Noten; in conformit�e4t der Pariser Edition sehr correct heraus zugeben, und versprechen solches von allen darinn sich befindlichen Fehleren zu reinigen &c. das gantze Werck, welches in <FORMAT>4t�b0</FORMAT> <VOLUME>9. Volumina</VOLUME> haltet, solle die Herren Praenumeranten nicht mehr als <PRICE>67 Livres Frantz�f6sische Valuta</PRICE> oder <PRICE>40. Francken Genffer-Geld</PRICE> kosten &c. das weitere kan aus dem Project und Aviso bey Herrn Onoffrio Hoffmann allhier ersehen werden.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1) Replaced incorrectly encoded German umlauts and ß (e.g. 'Gebr�fcder', 'Buchf�f�fhrere', 'sch�f6n', 'Frantz�f6sische', 'conformit�e4t') with proper Unicode characters to restore readable text.
2) Inserted missing space in 'PublicoSubscriptions-Weis' → 'Publico Subscriptions-Weis' and 'M. T.Ciccronis' → 'M. T. Ciccronis' for correct tokenization.
3) Replaced the stray encoded dagger sign after 'Commentariorum' with a simple section marker '§' as a cleaner representation of the likely original critical mark.
4) Normalized format mark '4t�a4' → '4t�b0' (4°) inside the <FORMAT> tag to reflect standard bibliographical notation.
5) Corrected malformed price tagging: replaced the first opening tag <PRIZE> with the correct tag name <PRICE> so that it matches the closing </PRICE>; also harmonized the second price opening tag from <PRIZE> to <PRICE>. Now both prices are consistently in <PRICE> elements.
6) Replaced garbled '&c.' sequences ('�cd�f9�f5c.') with plain '&c.' twice, preserving the period as normal Latin abbreviation punctuation."}
